name: Real Extreme Bike: Stunt Rider
description:
Real Extreme Bike: Stunt Rider for lovers of bike racing games, Perform extreme stunts with your bike and have fun of stuntman bike rider. Drive the bike on rough environment and moving platform to performs massive jumps on a verity of tracks to do extreme stunts.

Are you a daredevil? Simple bike racing games has no match for this stuntman bike racing game, its just like a wipeout type bike stunts in which you have to avoid bouncing balls, moving platform, punches and speed pendulums.

Features:
- Attractive and detailed snow and city environment
- Thrilling extreme bike racing tracks
- Different stunt bike models with real and unique features
- Realistic Physics Engine
- Extreme bike stunts
- No WiFi is required to play
- Challenging and thrilling missions
- Attractive background music and sounds
- Front flip and back flip to get extra score
- In a single trial you are able to control the ride
- Simple but need practice to become bike master
- Free and real extreme bike stunt game to install and enjoy.
- Collection of different extreme bike in store
- crazy and Extreme rooftop ramps and tracks
- 3d environment
